58ca773b44b4b.Name: LLP011 List adddresses to select from
58ca773b44b4b.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search_after},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
AND postcode != ''
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300"}

58ca6c233f02c.Name: LLP015 Selected value to fields
58ca6c233f02c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
	sao as flat_out,
	pao as house_out,
	street_name as street_out,
	town_name as town_out, 
	postcode as postcode_out5,
	uprn as uprn_out,
	lng as lng_out,
	lat as lat_out,
	{Choose_Address} as uprn_selected
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
	uprn = {Choose_Address}"}

58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)"}

58cac46f269a2.Name: LLP017 Change to Use Customer Recorded
58cac46f269a2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {flat}, '') as flat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {house}, '') as house_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {street}, '') as street_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {town}, '') as town_out, 
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {country}, '') as country_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {uprn}, '') as uprn_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lng}, '') as lng_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lat}, '') as lat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existSelected,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existingCustomer,
 'ProcAi' as haveRun"}

58efbd46c0cbd.Output_template: {"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select a.*, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'Entered','') as uprn_selected, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',1) as Address_Found, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',concat(if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 < 3,'The address must contain a flat or house number, road and postcode. ',''),if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from (select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%' or {subParam} like '%mPo%',0,1)) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[Uu][Bb]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

5eaaf428ddeb0.Name: GWS008 - List of NHS Establishment for search criteria
5eaaf428ddeb0.Output_template:
{"method":"GET","url":"https://directory.spineservices.nhs.uk/ORD/2-0-0/organisations?{confirmEst}&{confirmPC}&{roleTypeFiltering}&_format=xml&Limit=20&Status=Active","show_headers":"no","responseType":"XML","strip_namespaces":"1","path_to_values":"OrgDetails","fields":"","xslt_stylesheet":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
<xsl:template match="Organisation">
  <body>
	<TransResults>
		<xsl:if test="((Name != preceding::Name[1]) and (PostCode != preceding::PostCode[1])) or not(preceding::Name[1])">
			<OrgDetails>
				<display><xsl:value-of select="Name"/> (<xsl:value-of select="PostCode"/>)</display>
				<name><xsl:value-of select="OrgId"/></name>
			</OrgDetails>
		</xsl:if>
	</TransResults>
  </body>
</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>","results_page_columns":"","secure_fields_db_http":""}

5e9f29593f7f3.Name: GWS006 - Details for specific Establishment
5e9f29593f7f3.Output_template:
{"method":"GET","url":"https://directory.spineservices.nhs.uk/ORD/2-0-0/organisations/{ODScode}","show_headers":"no","responseType":"JSON","strip_namespaces":"1","path_to_values":"OrgDetails","fields":"","xslt_stylesheet":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
<xsl:template match="Organisation">
  <body>
	<TransResults>
		<OrgDetails>
			<estPicked>
				<xsl:if test="Name != ''">
        			<xsl:text>estSelected</xsl:text>
      			</xsl:if>
			</estPicked>
			<establishmentName><xsl:value-of select="Name"/></establishmentName>
			<OrgId><xsl:value-of select="OrgId/extension"/></OrgId>
			<town_out><xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/Town"/></town_out>
			<upPostcode_out><xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/PostCode"/></upPostcode_out>
			<textOut1>
				<xsl:choose>
					<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1 != ''">
					  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1"/>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2 != ''">
					  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2"/>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/Town != ''">
					  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/Town"/>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:otherwise>
					  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/County"/>
					</xsl:otherwise>
				</xsl:choose>
			</textOut1>
			<textOut2>
				<xsl:choose>
					<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1 != ''">
						<xsl:choose>
							<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2 != ''">
								<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2"/>
							</xsl:when>
							<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/Town != ''">
							  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/Town"/>
							</xsl:when>
							<xsl:otherwise>
							  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/County"/>
							</xsl:otherwise>
						</xsl:choose>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1 = '' and GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2 != ''">
						<xsl:choose>
							<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/Town != ''">
							  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/Town"/>
							</xsl:when>
							<xsl:otherwise>
							  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/County"/>
							</xsl:otherwise>
						</xsl:choose>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:otherwise>
					  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/County"/>
					</xsl:otherwise>
				</xsl:choose>
			</textOut2>
			<textOut3>
				<xsl:choose>
					<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1 != '' and GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2 != ''">
						<xsl:choose>
							<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/Town != ''">
							  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/Town"/>
							</xsl:when>
							<xsl:otherwise>
							  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/County"/>
							</xsl:otherwise>
						</xsl:choose>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1 != '' and GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2 = '' or GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1 = '' and GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2 != ''">
						<xsl:choose>
							<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/Town != ''">
							  <xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/County"/>
							</xsl:when>
							<xsl:otherwise>
							  <xsl:text></xsl:text>
							</xsl:otherwise>
						</xsl:choose>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:otherwise>
					  <xsl:text></xsl:text>
					</xsl:otherwise>
				</xsl:choose>
			</textOut3>
			<textOut4>
				<xsl:choose>
					<xsl:when test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1 != '' and GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2 != '' and GeoLoc/Location/Town != ''">
						<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/County"/>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:otherwise>
					  <xsl:text></xsl:text>
					</xsl:otherwise>
				</xsl:choose>
			</textOut4>
			<AdTextArea_out>
				<xsl:if test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1!=''">
        			<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1"/>
        			<xsl:text>
</xsl:text>
      			</xsl:if>
				<xsl:if test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2 != ''">
        			<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2"/>
        			<xsl:text>
</xsl:text>
      			</xsl:if>
				<xsl:if test="GeoLoc/Location/Town != ''">
        			<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/Town"/>
        			<xsl:text>
</xsl:text>
      			</xsl:if>
				<xsl:if test="GeoLoc/Location/County != ''">
        			<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/County"/>
        			<xsl:text>
</xsl:text>
      			</xsl:if>
      			<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/PostCode"/>
			</AdTextArea_out>
			<AddrConcat>
				<xsl:if test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1!=''">
        			<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn1"/>
        			<xsl:text>, </xsl:text>
      			</xsl:if>
				<xsl:if test="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2 != ''">
        			<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/AddrLn2"/>
        			<xsl:text>, </xsl:text>
      			</xsl:if>
				<xsl:if test="GeoLoc/Location/Town != ''">
        			<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/Town"/>
        			<xsl:text>, </xsl:text>
      			</xsl:if>
				<xsl:if test="GeoLoc/Location/County != ''">
        			<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/County"/>
        			<xsl:text>, </xsl:text>
      			</xsl:if>
      			<xsl:value-of select="GeoLoc/Location/PostCode"/>
			</AddrConcat>
			
			<xsl:for-each select="Contacts/Contact/ArrayNode[type = 'tel']">
				<xsl:if test="position() = 1">
					<telephone_out>
						<xsl:value-of select="translate(value, ' ', '')"/>
					</telephone_out>
					<checkTel>
						<xsl:value-of select="type"/>
					</checkTel>
				</xsl:if>
			</xsl:for-each>
			
		</OrgDetails>
	</TransResults>
  </body>
</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>","results_page_columns":"","secure_fields_db_http":""}

props.label: html 1
props.content:
Healthcare waste is the term we use to describe waste, such as used needles, pads etc, which has been produced as a result of a health issue. This may be as a result of an operation, or due to an ongoing medical condition.

Before the council can provide a collection of healthcare waste from your home, you will need to submit a referral form and have it approved. You can either ask your doctor or healthcare professional to do this, or you can fill in this online referral form.

Only complete this form when you are ready for your first collection.

props.label: html 8
props.content:
Privacy notice

Portsmouth City Council will process your personal information in accordance with data protection law. The personal details provided by you will be used by Clean City Services for the purposes of processing your request for a healthcare waste referral. Your details will be held on a database, DASH, and where the law allows and it is necessary to do so may be shared with other departments within the council and our 3rd party waste management contractor Biffa for the purposes of managing your waste referral. The council may also be required to disclose personal information to other third party organisations such as the Police, Department for Work and Pensions or for the National Fraud Initiative for the purposes of preventing or detecting crime or apprehending or prosecuting offenders.

For further information about how the Council collects and uses personal information please visit our website: https://www.portsmouth.gov.uk/ext/the-council/data-protection-privacy-notice
